1: וַֽיְהִי֙ <sup>1961 </sup> <n>came</n> מֵאַ֣חֲרֵי <sup>310 </sup> <n>And it came to pass after this</n> כֵ֔ן <sup>3651 </sup> <n>this</n> וַיַּ֤עַשׂ <sup>6213 </sup> <n>prepared</n> לוֹ֙ אַבְשָׁל֔וֹם <sup>53 </sup> <n>that Absalom</n> מֶרְכָּבָ֖ה <sup>4818 </sup> <n>him chariots</n> וְסֻסִ֑ים <sup>5483 </sup> <n>and horses</n> וַחֲמִשִּׁ֥ים <sup>2572 </sup> <n>and fifty</n> אִ֖ישׁ <sup>376 </sup> <n>men</n> רָצִ֥ים <sup>7323 </sup> <n>to run</n> לְפָנָֽיו׃ <sup>6440 </sup> <n>before</n>
2: וְהִשְׁכִּים֙ <sup>7925 </sup> <n>rose up early</n> אַבְשָׁל֔וֹם <sup>53 </sup> <n>And Absalom</n> וְעָמַ֕ד <sup>5975 </sup> <n>and stood</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>and</n> יַ֖ד <sup>3027 </sup> <n>beside</n> דֶּ֣רֶךְ <sup>1870 </sup> <n>the way</n> הַשָּׁ֑עַר <sup>8179 </sup> <n>of the gate</n> וַיְהִ֡י <sup>1961 </sup> <n>had</n> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>any</n> הָאִ֣ישׁ <sup>376 </sup> <n>and it was [so] that when any man</n> אֲשֶֽׁר־ <sup>834 </sup> <n>after</n> יִהְיֶה־ <sup>1961 </sup> <n>had</n> לּוֹ־ רִיב֩ <sup>7379 </sup> <n>that had a controversy</n> לָב֨וֹא <sup>935 </sup> <n>came</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to</n> הַמֶּ֜לֶךְ <sup>4428 </sup> <n>to the king</n> לַמִּשְׁפָּ֗ט <sup>4941 </sup> <n>for judgment</n> וַיִּקְרָ֨א <sup>7121 </sup> <n>called</n> אַבְשָׁל֤וֹם <sup>53 </sup> <n>then Absalom</n> אֵלָיו֙ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to him</n> וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <sup>559 </sup> <n>unto him and said</n> אֵֽי־ <sup>335 </sup> <n>Of what</n> מִזֶּ֥ה <sup>2088 </sup> <n>he</n> עִיר֙ <sup>5892 </sup> <n>city</n> אַ֔תָּה <sup>859 </sup> <n>you</n> וַיֹּ֕אמֶר <sup>559 </sup> <n>[art] thou? And he said</n> מֵאַחַ֥ד <sup>259 </sup> <n>[is] of one</n> שִׁבְטֵֽי־ <sup>7626 </sup> <n>of the tribes</n> יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <sup>3478 </sup> <n>of Israel</n> עַבְדֶּֽךָ׃ <sup>5650 </sup> <n>Thy servant</n>
3: וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <sup>559 </sup> <n>said</n> אֵלָיו֙ <sup>413 </sup> <n>then</n> אַבְשָׁל֔וֹם <sup>53 </sup> <n>And Absalom</n> רְאֵ֥ה <sup>7200 </sup> <n>unto him See</n> דְבָרֶ֖ךָ <sup>1697 </sup> <n>thy matters</n> טוֹבִ֣ים <sup>2896 </sup> <n>[are] good</n> וּנְכֹחִ֑ים <sup>5228 </sup> <n>and right</n> וְשֹׁמֵ֥עַ <sup>8085 </sup> <n>to hear</n> אֵין־ <sup>369 </sup> <n>no</n> לְךָ֖ מֵאֵ֥ת <sup>853 </sup> הַמֶּֽלֶךְ׃ <sup>4428 </sup> <n>but [there is] no man [deputed] of the king</n>
4: וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <sup>559 </sup> <n>said</n> אַבְשָׁל֔וֹם <sup>53 </sup> <n>Absalom</n> מִי־ <sup>4310 </sup> <n>Oh</n> יְשִׂמֵ֥נִי <sup>7760 </sup> <n>moreover Oh that I were made</n> שֹׁפֵ֖ט <sup>8199 </sup> <n>judge</n> בָּאָ֑רֶץ <sup>776 </sup> <n>in the land</n> וְעָלַ֗י <sup>5921 </sup> <n>and</n> יָב֥וֹא <sup>935 </sup> <n>might come</n> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>every</n> אִ֛ישׁ <sup>376 </sup> <n>that every man</n> אֲשֶֽׁר־ <sup>834 </sup> <n>who</n> יִהְיֶה־ <sup>1961 </sup> <n>has</n> לּוֹ־ רִ֥יב <sup>7379 </sup> <n>which hath any suit</n> וּמִשְׁפָּ֖ט <sup>4941 </sup> <n>or cause</n> וְהִצְדַּקְתִּֽיו׃ <sup>6663 </sup> <n>unto me and I would do him justice</n>
5: וְהָיָה֙ <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> בִּקְרָב־ <sup>7126 </sup> <n>came nigh</n> אִ֔ישׁ <sup>376 </sup> <n>And it was [so] that when any man</n> לְהִשְׁתַּחֲוֹ֖ת <sup>7812 </sup> <n>[to him] to do him obeisance</n> ל֑וֹ וְשָׁלַ֧ח <sup>7971 </sup> <n>he put forth</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> יָד֛וֹ <sup>3027 </sup> <n>his hand</n> וְהֶחֱזִ֥יק <sup>2388 </sup> <n>and took</n> ל֖וֹ וְנָ֥שַׁק <sup>5401 </sup> <n>him and kissed</n> לֽוֹ׃
6: וַיַּ֨עַשׂ <sup>6213 </sup> <n>did</n> אַבְשָׁל֜וֹם <sup>53 </sup> <n>Absalom</n> כַּדָּבָ֤ר <sup>1697 </sup> <n>And on this manner</n> הַזֶּה֙ <sup>2088 </sup> <n>this</n> לְכָל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <sup>3478 </sup> <n>to all Israel</n> אֲשֶׁר־ <sup>834 </sup> <n>who</n> יָבֹ֥אוּ <sup>935 </sup> <n>that came</n> לַמִּשְׁפָּ֖ט <sup>4941 </sup> <n>for judgment</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to</n> הַמֶּ֑לֶךְ <sup>4428 </sup> <n>to the king</n> וַיְגַנֵּב֙ <sup>1589 </sup> <n>stole</n> אַבְשָׁל֔וֹם <sup>53 </sup> <n>so Absalom</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> לֵ֖ב <sup>3820 </sup> <n>the hearts</n> אַנְשֵׁ֥י <sup>376 </sup> <n>of the men</n> יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <sup>3478 </sup> <n>of Israel</n> פ
7: וַיְהִ֕י <sup>1961 </sup> <n>came</n> מִקֵּ֖ץ <sup>7093 </sup> <n>And it came to pass after</n> אַרְבָּעִ֣ים <sup>705 </sup> <n>forty</n> שָׁנָ֑ה <sup>8141 </sup> <n>years</n> וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <sup>559 </sup> <n>said</n> אַבְשָׁלוֹם֙ <sup>53 </sup> <n>that Absalom</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to</n> הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <sup>4428 </sup> <n>unto the king</n> אֵ֣לֲכָה <sup>1980 </sup> <n>go</n> נָּ֗א <sup>4994 </sup> <n>Please</n> וַאֲשַׁלֵּ֛ם <sup>7999 </sup> <n>and pay</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> נִדְרִ֛י <sup>5088 </sup> <n>my vow</n> אֲשֶׁר־ <sup>834 </sup> <n>which</n> נָדַ֥רְתִּי <sup>5087 </sup> <n>which I have vowed</n> לַֽיהוָ֖ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>unto the LORD</n> בְּחֶבְרֽוֹן׃ <sup>2275 </sup> <n>in Hebron</n>
8: כִּי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> נֵ֙דֶר֙ <sup>5088 </sup> <n>a vow</n> נָדַ֣ר <sup>5087 </sup> <n>vowed</n> עַבְדְּךָ֔ <sup>5650 </sup> <n>For thy servant</n> בְּשִׁבְתִּ֥י <sup>3427 </sup> <n>while I abode</n> בִגְשׁ֛וּר <sup>1650 </sup> <n>at Geshur</n> בַּאֲרָ֖ם <sup>758 </sup> <n>in Syria</n> לֵאמֹ֑ר <sup>559 </sup> <n>saying</n> אִם־ <sup>518 </sup> <n>If</n> [יְשִׁיב כ] (יָשֹׁ֨וב <sup>7725 </sup> <n>shall indeed</n> ק) יְשִׁיבֵ֤נִי <sup>7725 </sup> <n>shall indeed</n> יְהוָה֙ <sup>3068 </sup> <n>If the LORD</n> יְר֣וּשָׁלִַ֔ם <sup>3389 </sup> <n>indeed to Jerusalem</n> וְעָבַדְתִּ֖י <sup>5647 </sup> <n>then I will serve</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> יְהוָֽה׃ <sup>3068 </sup> <n>the LORD</n>
9: וַיֹּֽאמֶר־ <sup>559 </sup> <n>said</n> ל֥וֹ הַמֶּ֖לֶךְ <sup>4428 </sup> <n>And the king</n> לֵ֣ךְ <sup>1980 </sup> <n>Go</n> בְּשָׁל֑וֹם <sup>7965 </sup> <n>in peace</n> וַיָּ֖קָם <sup>6965 </sup> <n>So he arose</n> וַיֵּ֥לֶךְ <sup>1980 </sup> <n>and went</n> חֶבְרֽוֹנָה׃ <sup>2275 </sup> <n>to Hebron</n> פ
10: וַיִּשְׁלַ֤ח <sup>7971 </sup> <n>sent</n> אַבְשָׁלוֹם֙ <sup>53 </sup> <n>But Absalom</n> מְרַגְּלִ֔ים <sup>7270 </sup> <n>spies</n> בְּכָל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> שִׁבְטֵ֥י <sup>7626 </sup> <n>throughout all the tribes</n> יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <sup>3478 </sup> <n>of Israel</n> לֵאמֹ֑ר <sup>559 </sup> <n>saying</n> כְּשָׁמְעֲכֶם֙ <sup>8085 </sup> <n>As soon as ye hear</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> ק֣וֹל <sup>6963 </sup> <n>the sound</n> הַשֹּׁפָ֔ר <sup>7782 </sup> <n>of the trumpet</n> וַאֲמַרְתֶּ֕ם <sup>559 </sup> <n>then ye shall say</n> מָלַ֥ךְ <sup>4427 </sup> <n>reigneth</n> אַבְשָׁל֖וֹם <sup>53 </sup> <n>Absalom</n> בְּחֶבְרֽוֹן׃ <sup>2275 </sup> <n>in Hebron</n>
11: וְאֶת־ <sup>854 </sup> <n>with</n> אַבְשָׁל֗וֹם <sup>53 </sup> <n>And with Absalom</n> הָלְכ֞וּ <sup>1980 </sup> <n>went</n> מָאתַ֤יִם <sup>3967 </sup> <n>two hundred</n> אִישׁ֙ <sup>376 </sup> <n>men</n> מִיר֣וּשָׁלִַ֔ם <sup>3389 </sup> <n>out of Jerusalem</n> קְרֻאִ֖ים <sup>7121 </sup> <n>[that were] called</n> וְהֹלְכִ֣ים <sup>1980 </sup> <n>and they went</n> לְתֻמָּ֑ם <sup>8537 </sup> <n>in their simplicity</n> וְלֹ֥א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>did not</n> יָדְע֖וּ <sup>3045 </sup> <n>and they knew</n> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>any</n> דָּבָֽר׃ <sup>1697 </sup> <n>not any thing</n>
12: וַיִּשְׁלַ֣ח <sup>7971 </sup> <n>sent</n> אַ֠בְשָׁלוֹם <sup>53 </sup> <n>And Absalom</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> אֲחִיתֹ֨פֶל <sup>302 </sup> <n>for Ahithophel</n> הַגִּֽילֹנִ֜י <sup>1526 </sup> <n>the Gilonite</n> יוֹעֵ֣ץ <sup>3289 </sup> <n>counsellor</n> דָּוִ֗ד <sup>1732 </sup> <n>David's</n> מֵֽעִירוֹ֙ <sup>5892 </sup> <n>from his city</n> מִגִּלֹ֔ה <sup>1542 </sup> <n>[even] from Giloh</n> בְּזָבְח֖וֹ <sup>2076 </sup> <n>while he offered</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> הַזְּבָחִ֑ים <sup>2077 </sup> <n>sacrifices</n> וַיְהִ֤י <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> הַקֶּ֙שֶׁר֙ <sup>7195 </sup> <n>And the conspiracy</n> אַמִּ֔ץ <sup>533 </sup> <n>was strong</n> וְהָעָ֛ם <sup>5971 </sup> <n>for the people</n> הוֹלֵ֥ךְ <sup>1980 </sup> <n>continually</n> וָרָ֖ב <sup>7227 </sup> <n>increased</n> אֶת־ <sup>854 </sup> <n>with</n> אַבְשָׁלֽוֹם׃ <sup>53 </sup> <n>with Absalom</n>

30: וְדָוִ֡ד <sup>1732 </sup> <n>And David</n> עֹלֶה֩ <sup>5927 </sup> <n>went up</n> בְמַעֲלֵ֨ה <sup>4608 </sup> <n>by the ascent</n> הַזֵּיתִ֜ים <sup>2132 </sup> <n>of [mount] Olivet</n> עֹלֶ֣ה ׀ <sup>5927 </sup> <n>as he went up</n> וּבוֹכֶ֗ה <sup>1058 </sup> <n>and wept</n> וְרֹ֥אשׁ <sup>7218 </sup> <n>and had his head</n> לוֹ֙ חָפ֔וּי <sup>2645 </sup> <n>covered</n> וְה֖וּא <sup>1931 </sup> <n>and he</n> הֹלֵ֣ךְ <sup>1980 </sup> <n>and he went</n> יָחֵ֑ף <sup>3182 </sup> <n>barefoot</n> וְכָל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> הָעָ֣ם <sup>5971 </sup> <n>and all the people</n> אֲשֶׁר־ <sup>834 </sup> <n>who</n> אִתּ֗וֹ <sup>854 </sup> <n>for</n> חָפוּ֙ <sup>2645 </sup> <n>that [was] with him covered</n> אִ֣ישׁ <sup>376 </sup> <n>every man</n> רֹאשׁ֔וֹ <sup>7218 </sup> <n>his head</n> וְעָל֥וּ <sup>5927 </sup> <n>and they went up</n> עָלֹ֖ה <sup>5927 </sup> <n>as they went up</n> וּבָכֹֽה׃ <sup>1058 </sup> <n>weeping</n>
31: וְדָוִד֙ <sup>1732 </sup> <n>David</n> הִגִּ֣יד <sup>5046 </sup> <n>And [one] told</n> לֵאמֹ֔ר <sup>559 </sup> <n>saying</n> אֲחִיתֹ֥פֶל <sup>302 </sup> <n>Ahithophel</n> בַּקֹּשְׁרִ֖ים <sup>7194 </sup> <n>[is] among the conspirators</n> עִם־ <sup>5973 </sup> <n>with</n> אַבְשָׁל֑וֹם <sup>53 </sup> <n>with Absalom</n> וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <sup>559 </sup> <n>said</n> דָּוִ֔ד <sup>1732 </sup> <n>And David</n> סַכֶּל־ <sup>5528 </sup> <n>into foolishness</n> נָ֛א <sup>4994 </sup> <n>pray</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> עֲצַ֥ת <sup>6098 </sup> <n>I pray thee turn the counsel</n> אֲחִיתֹ֖פֶל <sup>302 </sup> <n>of Ahithophel</n> יְהוָֽה׃ <sup>3068 </sup> <n>O LORD</n>
32: וַיְהִ֤י <sup>1961 </sup> <n>happened</n> דָוִד֙ <sup>1732 </sup> <n>And it came to pass that [when] David</n> בָּ֣א <sup>935 </sup> <n>was come</n> עַד־ <sup>5704 </sup> <n>against</n> הָרֹ֔אשׁ <sup>7218 </sup> <n>to the top</n> אֲשֶֽׁר־ <sup>834 </sup> <n>after</n> יִשְׁתַּחֲוֶ֥ה <sup>7812 </sup> <n>[of the mount] where he worshipped</n> שָׁ֖ם <sup>8033 </sup> <n>in it</n> לֵאלֹהִ֑ים <sup>430 </sup> <n>God</n> וְהִנֵּ֤ה <sup>2009 </sup> <n>behold</n> לִקְרָאתוֹ֙ <sup>7125 </sup> <n>came to meet</n> חוּשַׁ֣י <sup>2365 </sup> <n>behold Hushai</n> הָאַרְכִּ֔י <sup>757 </sup> <n>the Archite</n> קָר֙וּעַ֙ <sup>7167 </sup> <n>rent</n> כֻּתָּנְתּ֔וֹ <sup>3801 </sup> <n>him with his coat</n> וַאֲדָמָ֖ה <sup>127 </sup> <n>and earth</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>on</n> רֹאשֽׁוֹ׃ <sup>7218 </sup> <n>upon his head</n>
33: וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <sup>559 </sup> <n>said</n> ל֖וֹ דָּוִ֑ד <sup>1732 </sup> <n>Unto whom David</n> אִ֚ם <sup>518 </sup> <n>If</n> עָבַ֣רְתָּ <sup>5674 </sup> <n>If thou passest on</n> אִתִּ֔י <sup>854 </sup> <n>for</n> וְהָיִ֥תָ <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> עָלַ֖י <sup>5921 </sup> <n>with</n> לְמַשָּֽׂא׃ <sup>4853 </sup> <n>with me then thou shalt be a burden</n>
34: וְאִם־ <sup>518 </sup> <n>if</n> הָעִ֣יר <sup>5892 </sup> <n>to the city</n> תָּשׁ֗וּב <sup>7725 </sup> <n>But if thou return</n> וְאָמַרְתָּ֤ <sup>559 </sup> <n>and say</n> לְאַבְשָׁלוֹם֙ <sup>53 </sup> <n>unto Absalom</n> עַבְדְּךָ֨ <sup>5650 </sup> <n>I will be thy servant</n> אֲנִ֤י <sup>589 </sup> <n>I</n> הַמֶּ֙לֶךְ֙ <sup>4428 </sup> <n>O king</n> אֶֽהְיֶ֔ה <sup>1961 </sup> <n>have been</n> עֶ֣בֶד <sup>5650 </sup> <n>servant</n> אָבִ֤יךָ <sup>1 </sup> <n>[as] I [have been] thy father's</n> וַֽאֲנִי֙ <sup>589 </sup> <n>in</n> מֵאָ֔ז <sup>227 </sup> <n>hitherto</n> וְעַתָּ֖ה <sup>6258 </sup> <n>will now</n> וַאֲנִ֣י <sup>589 </sup> <n>I</n> עַבְדֶּ֑ךָ <sup>5650 </sup> <n>so [will] I now also [be] thy servant</n> וְהֵפַרְתָּ֣ה <sup>6565 </sup> <n>then mayest thou for me defeat</n> לִ֔י אֵ֖ת <sup>853 </sup> עֲצַ֥ת <sup>6098 </sup> <n>the counsel</n> אֲחִיתֹֽפֶל׃ <sup>302 </sup> <n>of Ahithophel</n>
35: וַהֲל֤וֹא <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> עִמְּךָ֙ <sup>5973 </sup> <n>with</n> שָׁ֔ם <sup>8033 </sup> <n>are not</n> צָד֥וֹק <sup>6659 </sup> <n>And [hast thou] not there with thee Zadok</n> וְאֶבְיָתָ֖ר <sup>54 </sup> <n>and Abiathar</n> הַכֹּהֲנִ֑ים <sup>3548 </sup> <n>the priests</n> וְהָיָ֗ה <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all manner</n> הַדָּבָר֙ <sup>1697 </sup> <n>act</n> אֲשֶׁ֤ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>you</n> תִּשְׁמַע֙ <sup>8085 </sup> <n>soever thou shalt hear</n> מִבֵּ֣ית <sup>1004 </sup> <n>house</n> הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <sup>4428 </sup> <n>out of the king's</n> תַּגִּ֕יד <sup>5046 </sup> <n>thou shalt tell</n> לְצָד֥וֹק <sup>6659 </sup> <n>[it] to Zadok</n> וּלְאֶבְיָתָ֖ר <sup>54 </sup> <n>and Abiathar</n> הַכֹּהֲנִֽים׃ <sup>3548 </sup> <n>the priests</n>
36: הִנֵּה־ <sup>2009 </sup> <n>Behold</n> שָׁ֤ם <sup>8033 </sup> <n>there</n> עִמָּם֙ <sup>5973 </sup> <n>with</n> שְׁנֵ֣י <sup>8147 </sup> <n>Behold [they have] there with them their two</n> בְנֵיהֶ֔ם <sup>1121 </sup> <n>sons</n> אֲחִימַ֣עַץ <sup>290 </sup> <n>Ahimaaz</n> לְצָד֔וֹק <sup>6659 </sup> <n>Zadok's</n> וִיהוֹנָתָ֖ן <sup>3083 </sup> <n>[son] and Jonathan</n> לְאֶבְיָתָ֑ר <sup>54 </sup> <n>Abiathar's</n> וּשְׁלַחְתֶּ֤ם <sup>7971 </sup> <n>ye shall send</n> בְּיָדָם֙ <sup>3027 </sup> <n>[son] and by them</n> אֵלַ֔י <sup>413 </sup> <n>about</n> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>everything</n> דָּבָ֖ר <sup>1697 </sup> <n>unto me every thing</n> אֲשֶׁ֥ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>you</n> תִּשְׁמָֽעוּ׃ <sup>8085 </sup> <n>that ye can hear</n>
37: וַיָּבֹ֥א <sup>935 </sup> <n>came</n> חוּשַׁ֛י <sup>2365 </sup> <n>So Hushai</n> רֵעֶ֥ה <sup>7463 </sup> <n>friend</n> דָוִ֖ד <sup>1732 </sup> <n>David's</n> הָעִ֑יר <sup>5892 </sup> <n>into the city</n> וְאַבְשָׁלֹ֔ם <sup>53 </sup> <n>and Absalom</n> יָבֹ֖א <sup>935 </sup> <n>came</n> יְרוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <sup>3389 </sup> <n>into Jerusalem</n>
